selection.message: Please select a language from the list
selection.title: Language Selection

category.tapcategories: Tap on the categories you wish to follow

settings.legal: SummIt is a news aggregator and content delivery platform focused on delivering concise, immediate and accurate news to its users. To refer to our Terms and Conditions, and our Privacy Policy, please use the appropriate links in the settings page.

share.subject: Check out my favourite news app!
share.text:
The best way to read the news: SummIt - the Short News App
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.summit.fuji

ratemyapp.title: What do you think of our app?
ratemyapp.message: If you like this app, please take a little bit of your time to review it! It really helps us and it should not take you more than a minute.

tutorial.endtut: That's it! Now stay updated with SummIt - the best way to read the news!
tutorial.swipetosettings: Swipe right to access the Settings
tutorial.share: Share this news card with your friends with just one tap!
tutorial.refresh: Tap this button to refresh your news feed
tutorial.web: Read the full article from the source with this button
tutorial.swipeup: Swipe up to read the next card
tutorial.swipeup_desc:
SummIt News is delivered to you in short cards that give you the most important information.
 Tap the button to continue
tutorial.language: Change languages between English and Arabic
tutorial.notifications: Enable or disable notification alerts for important news here
tutorial.nightmode: Enable or disable Night Mode for easier reading at night
tutorial.shareapp: Share our app with your contacts
tutorial.rateapp: Rate our app. Don't forget to give us 5 stars!
tutorial.feedback: Send us your valuable feedback. We'd love to hear it!
